# PTServiceStatus.connecting

**Case**

A type that indicates the service is attempting to establish a connection.

## Declaration

```swift
case connecting
```

## Statuses

- **PTServiceStatus.ready**: A type that indicates the service is available for use.
- **PTServiceStatus.unavailable**: A type that indicates the service is unavailable and needs to be re-established.

items.description: A type that indicates the service is available for use.
items.name: PTServiceStatus.ready

items.description: A type that indicates the service is unavailable and needs to be re-established.
